data.title: Brookfield
data.meta_description: Ben Brown is a Managing Partner in Brookfield’s Real Estate Group, and Head of the Americas region. In this role, he is responsible for overseeing all real estate activities in the region, including investments and portfolio management. He is also sector head for office globally. Ben has held various roles at the Firm, including head of the U.S. office portfolio and he has lead acquisitions and dispositions for the office property business in London and New York.
data.text:
Ben Brown is a Managing Partner in Brookfield’s Real Estate Group, and Head of the Americas region. In this role, he is responsible for overseeing all real estate activities in the region, including investments and portfolio management. He is also sector head for office globally. Ben has held various roles at the Firm, including head of the U.S. office portfolio and he has lead acquisitions and dispositions for the office property business in London and New York.

Prior to joining Brookfield in 2010, Mr. Brown worked at the New Boston Fund, Sovereign Bank and Thor Equities.

Mr. Brown holds a Bachelor of Science Degree from Northeastern University and is a member of the Real Estate Board of New York’s Executive Committee and Board of Governors.
